QC.Acc01.description: Is the source code managed with a Version Control System?

evidence.success: Source code uses Git for version control
evidence.failure: Source code not managed with Git version control system

QC.Acc01.evidence: The source code shall be managed with Git and remain publicly available for this criterion to be successful. Please check Pro Git about how to get started using Git tool. Guidelines provided by the most popular social coding platforms (GitHub, GitLab) are also a good starting point
